website_summaries.verdict: The fact that this is not only an effective hydrating facial mist, but can also be used on hair and the scalp, makes it a impressive multi-use product.
pros: Easy to use with effective spray attachment
Noticeably improves the look of pores
Conveniently can be used on hair in addition to on face
Feels very refreshing, especially in hot weather
cons: Comes in a small bottle, and needs to be repurchased frequently

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT live without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: People complain about the price of this product. I have no problem with the price. It really is Magic. I immediately thought it took the swelling away in my eyes. I didn't even know it claimed to do that!!! The swelling in my eyes is now gone!!! I SWEAR!!. They are usually swollen everyday because of allergy etcetera. I love the way it firms my skin and I love the way it makes my hair feel. I will never live without it... It is DEFINITELY not just water!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Howell

customer_reviews.title: Colorless and odorless vitamin B?? Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet if it does anything... but very skeptical that it contains any vitamin B because vitamin B always has a strong distinct smell and you expect it to be a dark/yellow color. So I'd like to know how they were able to make this product completely colorless and odorless when it clearly states that it's packed with vitamin B's... the jury is still out...
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's water, but it's wonderful! **UPDATE 08/2016** I just purchased my second bottle. I've read a lot of people got this for free or discounted - I did not! I really like this product and living in Arizona my skin gets seriously dry. This is the best pick-me-up I've found. Nice hydration with a light feel & micro spray.
customer_reviews.author: SansSensibility

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Product - Especially on Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Optimized really works well when applied to damp hair. Must be the combo of H2O, Hylaraunic Acid & Cocoanut & other Oils that works to smooth the hair follicles and significantly reduce the frizz. Helps on days I don't have time to blow dry or use a hot iron on my hair. I also like to apply it after washing my face and before applying a serum or facial cream. Very nice product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a thyroid condition, which causes my skin and hair to be excessively dry. I have been using this product and the Hyaluronic acid, and my hair, skin and scalp are thriving from these products. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing I love it! First time my hair doesn't feel crunchy and dry and I love it on my face too!!! I saw the negative reviews and thought I'd add mine because I don't want yet another product I love to go away. I use it on wet hair right after the shower and my face before my face routine or when it feels parched. This is a real review!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: So Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mist Spray. I've had it for a short period, yet it is my FAVORITE so far. I've tried a number of "mist" with similar ingredients and really like this one the best. Makes my skin feel so hydrated and refreshed. I love how my make-up looks and lasts longer. When I use it on my hair, it does not feel as though it leaves a "film" or "dirty" look. Love this product and recommend it highly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecile W.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this for a very light weight summer moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this for a very light weight summer moisturizer. I can use this spray to have a little something on my skin during the hot months that doesn't ever leave a film or become greasy later on. Of course in the fall & winter this is not moisturizing at all but i do use it before my facial moisturizer. It's got a beautiful fine mist type of spray. Completely gentle and unscented. I bought it for the great ingredients, which, when I spray I can't detect are there. A bit pricey but worth it as a couple sprays will do.
customer_reviews.author: e.l.

customer_reviews.title: It’s JUST WATER PEOPLE!
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way there’s anything in it but WATER. ZERO smell. (Should you not smell the vitamins or coconut???) Drys instantly just as water would. No hydrating effect or refreshing properties such as rose water at a FRACTION of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLoo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product ZERO STARS but the review made me pic at least one star. I’m pretty sure it was JUST WATER!!!!! Do not buy from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Marky Mark

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be as good as the reviews said but it did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jess House

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad bottle design
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair softer and fuller with more volume. The bad bottle design is what made me give it only 4 stars, the bottle doesn't stay up
customer_reviews.author: Perikita

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it on my face, spritz lightly before make-up, after make-up, lightly on my hair. Whenever I feel parched skin & just want to freshen up. Will definitely order again. Thank you Optimized!
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: I really like this one on mature dry sun damage skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it in my facial room since I got it . I have other kind hydrators similar , I really like this one on mature dry sun damage skin. I also like what it did for my hair, my hair is always dry and frizzy even though my skin it's oily .

customer_reviews.text: It was good Did not come with a refill was a little high priced

customer_reviews.title: Rather expensive

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd time ordering. Love what it does for my face!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! When I spritz my face and go about my day, I notice later that my forehead is smooth. No fine lines at all on my 58 year old skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I wish it was not so expensive. My hair and face love it - makes my grey old lady hair look much better.
customer_reviews.author: yellowhair

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-aging products
customer_reviews.text: I use this H2O as a toner and as a makeup before and after primer. It is very lightweight a soothing to the skin. This product as many skin benefits, and best of all it can be use on hair, face, body and scalp. I have seborrheic dermatitis on my scalp and this product relieves my dryness and itching when I apply it throughout the day. This product and their Hyaluronic Acid serum plus Vitamin C skin perfector are must haves in your daily skin care regimen. I am in my 40's, and I want to tell everyone that you need these products in your life to combat the signs of aging.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY ONEAL

customer_reviews.title: Did not notice a change in hair or skin
customer_reviews.text: My product leaked in transit, Amazon refunded my money thankfully...I used the product for 3 days and did not notice a difference in my skin or hair, I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face Toner
customer_reviews.text: I read a recommendation about this it using this moisturizer as a face toner too, Really what have I got to lose. One thing for sure when I gently use my fingernail to scratch over my cheeks, my skin does not turn ashy gray anymore. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a good product. The reason for only a three star rating is the cost, along with the small size, makes it too expensive to use as much as I think is necessary be effective.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated!!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair that is awful in the morning. I spray this on my hair and face when I get up, and my hair remoisturizes and the curls behave and my face feel great.

customer_reviews.title: It feels very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Eff yeah
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty sensitive skin and break out with most face lotions, so this stuff has been a blessing. Holy moly. My skin looks great, lines are diminished, hair is stoked. 10/10 am buying again.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Has made a difference in the clarity and texture of my skin! Balances your skin to normalize whether oily or dry and feels amazing! Try it!

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! Love the way it feels on my skin and it makes my hair so shiny and healthy. I got it faster than expected and in great condition. Botton line...Great product from a great seller!

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. I'm a big fan of face spritzers
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I'm a big fan of face spritzers. I have been using them for years. I never leave the house with out a spritzer. I find Optimized even more beneficial with additional Vitamin C among other high quality ingredience! Great price as well!

customer_reviews.title: Great for hydrating the skin/face and hair
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using it for 24 hours and it does make my face feel more smoother than before, due to an hysterectomy my skin has really dried out. Now that it is winter it has gotten worse so I wanted to try something to hydrate it and I seen this so I wanted to give it a try. I spayed it on twice when I recv'd it yesterday and once in the morning today and will do it again later this afternoon. So far I like the results, the bottle is somewhat small I did not read how many oz's but I really like it. I would recommend this product for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.text: I love the light spray and how it makes my hair and skin feel. It’s so refreshing and moisturizing. I spray it throughout the day to look dewy

My only suggestion is maybe to sell a refill bottle because these are so small.

It is an accompaniment to your skin care routine; don't buy this single product expecting to turn into a 16 year old😉. I LOVE this, (so does my husby who keeps his own bottle to use after shaving and as a scalp/hair treatment as his hair is thinning)!

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, but a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the softness of the water, and how the ingredients are absorbed quickly. As the manufacturer suggests, putting moisturizer or face oil on right afterwards really makes a difference. It enhances the moisturizer. Everything is absorbed, so it has a chance to work. It doesn't just "sit" on your face. I've noticed softer, clearer skin. The spray is incredibly refreshing, as well!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for  75 year old skin and hair.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my hair and skin both after washing and when dry. It has completely rejuvenated my hair--so much better than all the conditioners and treatments I have used with very little benefit. My body is 75 years old, but my hair looks young again.

Going to give this at Christmas to family members!!

As a cash strapped college student however, I do wish it was cheaper and/or greater in quantity. Lastly, though this may arguably be my fault, I assumed that the card next to the bottle is some sort of 're-fill mix and shake' of some sort because of how it looks. This might be a misleading image to others as well even though nowhere in the product description does it say it comes with a 're-fill mix'.

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered it because my hair is so dry and frizzy in the summer in humid weather, but this really makes a difference. I'm amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product a lot. I keep it in my car. When I'm stuck in traffic, feel tired, or like my skin needs some moisture I spray it and feel great. I strongly suggest this for extra moisture for your skin. Also it's great on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Bubisa

customer_reviews.title: I mean.. it's water, and it's wet...
customer_reviews.text: Meh, it's okay... I don't know what I was expecting.. I guess I thought it would be more hydrating, but it's pretty much just water. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's great. Makes my skin feel so refreshed
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only used this on my face, but it's great. Makes my skin feel so refreshed! Love the mister also, no big droplets, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This is my first time using this product and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product and I must say I will be a long time consumer. After washing my face, I must spray the water, otherwise my face feels dry. It complements well with my vitamin c and hyaluronic serums, moisturizer and sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Ariyibi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simply incredible product! I would give it 10 stars. I have very difficult and sensitive skin due to scleroderma, Winter weather is just brutal. messy creams are a pain. I sprtiz this all over head,face and neck and get tremendous relief and hydration,which is not an easy feat with this issue, Bless you for offering this product. It is just what the doctor didnt order and I found it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Shelters

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: staying young looking is not easy and takes time and money. this is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Walter T.

product_meta.description: ULTRA Pure water as a foundation, OPTIMIZED H2O is optimized to nourish, detoxify and protect hair, scalp, face and skin. Clean skin helps prevent blemishes, clean scalp promotes hair growth. The professional stylists first tool for cleaning and prepping hair/skin is available as a nutrient-rich daily SUPER YOUTH MIST. Hair protection Hair hydration Skin hydration anti aging wrinkle remover water for hair pure water water for skin dark spot remover puffy eye remover dry skin dry hair protect hair protect skin best hair and scalp protection restore hair,itchy scalp, high heat thermal protector, hydrating facial mist
feature_bullets: TRULY THE BEST - US MADE - by a Stanford University Ph.D Doctor Hair MULTI-BOND Plus Face Health Recovery Water Mist. Fights dry, limp, thinning, frizzed out hair, prevent discoloration from hard water, sun exposure and heat from blow dryer and irons. Strengthens hair and promotes a clean environment for hair growth. ALSO Developed for skin, reduces pore size, diminishes dark spots and signs of aging caused by UV exposure, revealing a brighter, vibrant, more radiant look.

RESTORE & REPLENISH MOISTURE - Guaranteed to give your skin that silky tightening feel, moisture boost needed to achieve that youthful glow & is proven to repair Collagen to reduce skin's fine lines and wrinkles. Increase collagen synthesis and reverse skin damage and skin's overall elasticity.

POWERFUL FOR HAIR AND SKIN - anti-aging youth formula. UV Protectant, Nourish Detoxify, Infuse moisture, fills in crevices improves the look fine lines, wrinkles while firming and giving you a timeless complexion. Professional medical-grade moisturizing serum plumps and tightens your skin.

BALANCE YOUR HAIR AND SKIN - Balanced at 5.0pH your hair and skin will love you again. Absolutely NO BUILD-UP ULTRA PURE. Pharmaceutical grade NUTRIENTS your hair and Skin crave with B12, B6, B5, B3, Vitamin C, E, BIOTIN, UV Protectant for color treated hair.

GREAT FOR ALL SKIN TYPES- Increases Skin Hydration, Reduces Effects of Sun Damage, Neutralizes Free Radicals. No alcohol, paraben preservatives, sulfates or fragrance. Our non-greasy solution is PREFERRED by our customers over creams, lotions, dry powders, capsules, conditioner or peels. ESTHETICIANS recommend to keep skin clean, fresh and toned. FOR HAIR- Maintain the health after OLAPLEX and after BRAZILIAN BLOWOUT keep hair healthy. Keep color treated hair hydrated, minimize fading and discoloration.
